blogPost.excerpt: The Box Timer is a free and simple workout timer that works just like the timer at your local box. It is perfect for workouts at home, outside or at your box.
blogPost.body: The Box Timer is a free and simple workout timer that works just like the timer at your local box. It is perfect for workouts at home, outside or at your box.
blogPost.title: The Box Timer - A simple workout timer
blogPost.author: Edvin Linden

localize.description: 盒子计时器是一个免费和简单的锻炼计时器，它的工作原理就像你当地盒子的计时器一样。它是完美的锻炼在家里，外面或在你的盒子。
localize.tagline: 一个简单的锻炼计时器

localize.description: 盒子計時器是一個免費和簡單的鍛鍊計時器，它的工作原理就像你當地盒子的計時器一樣。它是完美的鍛鍊在家裏，外面或在你的盒子。
localize.tagline: 一個簡單的鍛鍊計時器

previous.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!
previous.title: Figma Comments on Mobile - View and add comments on Figma using your mobile device.

localize.description: Figma Comments允许你在手机上直接查看和添加新的评论。您所要做的就是连接您的 Figma 帐户并选择您需要的文件。当你的队友回复时，你将会在应用程序上看到新的评论，而且是实时的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移动设备在Figma上查看和添加评论。

localize.description: Figma Comments允許你在手機上直接查看和添加新的評論。您所要做的就是連接您的 Figma 帳戶並選擇您需要的文件。當你的隊友回覆時，你將會在應用程序上看到新的評論，而且是實時的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移動設備在Figma上查看和添加評論。

next.excerpt: ❤️ Open source 🤖 Native 🔌 Plugin system ⌨️ Custom hotkeys ⬆️ Sort options by frequency of use 📦 Small size (less than 20mb) Spotter is a productivity tool, the main function is to search and launch applications actions and applications themselves.
next.title: Spotter - Productivity tool that allows you to launch everything

localize.description: ❤️开源 🤖原生 🔌插件系统 ⌨️自定义热键 ⬆️按使用频率排序选项 📦体积小(小于20mb)Spotter是一个生产力工具，主要功能是搜索和启动应用的动作和应用本身。
localize.tagline: 生产力工具，允许你启动一切

localize.description: ❤️開源 🤖原生 🔌插件系統 ⌨️自定義熱鍵 ⬆️按使用頻率排序選項 📦體積小(小於20mb)Spotter是一個生產力工具，主要功能是搜索和啓動應用的動作和應用本身。
localize.tagline: 生產力工具，允許你啓動一切
